remarks: If dual modular implies modular whenever meet is zero, then dual modular implies modular for arbitrary lattice elements.  This theorem is needed for the remark after Lemma 7 of [Holland] p. 1524 to hold.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Apr-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)

mddmdin0.3 $e |- A. x e. CH A. y e. CH ( ( x MH* y /\ ( x i^i y ) = 0H ) -> x MH y ) $.
mddmdin0i $p |- ( A MH* B -> A MH B ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
